Text: Daniel M. "Dan" Pallotta (born January 21, 1961) is an American entrepreneur, author, and humanitarian activist.

Triplets:<Daniel M. "Dan" Pallotta
1:
--------------------
Text: Dan Pallotta:  He is best known for his involvement in multi-day charitable events with the long-distance Breast Cancer 3-Day walks, AIDS Rides bicycle journeys, and Out of the Darkness suicide prevention night walks.
Triplets:<Dan Pallotta

Text: Dan Pallotta:  Over nine years, 182,000 people participated in these events and raised $582 million.
